46 class ContainerBasePrivate;
48 class ContainerBase : public Stage
49 {
50 public:
51  PRIVATE_CLASS(ContainerBase)
52  using pointer = std::unique_ptr<ContainerBase>;
53 
54  size_t numChildren() const;
55  Stage* findChild(const std::string& name) const;
56 
59  using StageCallback = std::function<bool(const Stage&, unsigned int)>;
61  bool traverseChildren(const StageCallback& processor) const;
63  bool traverseRecursively(const StageCallback& processor) const;
64 
65  void add(Stage::pointer&& stage);
66 
67  virtual bool insert(Stage::pointer&& stage, int before = -1);
68  virtual bool remove(int pos);
69  virtual bool remove(Stage* child);
70  virtual void clear();
71 
72  void reset() override;
73  void init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) override;
74 
75  virtual bool canCompute() const = 0;
76  virtual void compute() = 0;
77 
79  virtual void onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) = 0;
80 
81 protected:
82  ContainerBase(ContainerBasePrivate* impl);
83 };
84 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const ContainerBase& stage);

86 class SerialContainerPrivate;

94  bool canCompute() const override;
95  void compute() override;
96 
97 protected:
99  void onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) override;
100

102

109  double trace_cost = 0);
110 
111 protected:

129

131  ParallelContainerBase(ParallelContainerBasePrivate* impl);
132 
134  inline void liftSolution(const SolutionBase& solution) { liftSolution(solution, solution.cost()); }
136  void liftSolution(const SolutionBase& solution, double cost) { liftSolution(solution, cost, solution.comment()); }
137 
139  void liftSolution(const SolutionBase& solution, double cost, std::string comment);
140 
142  void spawn(InterfaceState&& state, SubTrajectory&& trajectory);
144  void sendForward(const InterfaceState& from, InterfaceState&& to, SubTrajectory&& trajectory);
146  void sendBackward(InterfaceState&& from, const InterfaceState& to, SubTrajectory&& trajectory);
147 };
